name: Crunchy Apricot Cake
author: Ramona Glastetter

ingredients.name: (1 lb. 6 oz.) can apricot pie filling
pkg. (1 layer size) white cake mix

instructions: Spread pie filling in bottom of 9 x 9 x 2 inch baking dish. Com-bine cake mix, the water, and the egg. Using electric mixer, beat 4 minutes on medium speed. Pour over pie filling; sprinkle with coconut and pecans. Drizzle butter or margarine over top. Bake in moderate oven, 350Â°, for 40 minutes. Serve warm.
